name: Datacom Southeast Asia (M) Sdn Bhd
description: We have a track record of success in working with government agencies and companies at SME and enterprise level, and our teams are always solving for greater security, higher productivity, a more sustainable future, and to build better digital experiences for our customers.Our people are some of the most experienced in the industry, helping our customers transform their organisations, better serve their staff and customers, and realise their ambitions for growth and innovation. Our team's strength comes from combining deep expertise and local know-how with strategic partnerships with some of the world’s leading technology solution providers. Datacom Group is also an established provider of SaaS products – including Datapay, a payroll solution for medium to large organisations and Datascape, a solution for councils to work and engage with their local communities. Datacom also operates and manages local data centres powered by 100% renewable energy.

ShortDescription: Datacom is one of the largest IT companies in New Zealand, with over 3,300 staff, operating across 13 locations in Australia, New Zealand, Philippines and Malaysia.
enhanced_description: Datacom Southeast Asia (M) Sdn Bhd is a prominent IT company with a significant presence across New Zealand, Australia, Philippines, and Malaysia. They cater to a diverse client base, including government agencies, small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs), and large enterprise-level organizations. Datacom is dedicated to enhancing digital experiences, security, productivity, and fostering a sustainable future for its customers. Their expertise lies in organizational transformation, staff and customer service improvement, and driving growth and innovation through strategic technology partnerships. The company offers a suite of SaaS products, notably Datapay for payroll solutions tailored for medium to large organizations, and Datascape, a specialized solution for councils to engage with their local communities. Additionally, Datacom provides technology solutions encompassing Learning and Development, particularly Training Management Systems, and Internet of Things (IoT) services. Further demonstrating their commitment to sustainable operations, Datacom owns and operates local data centers powered by 100% renewable energy.
